p: There are numerous treatment modalities accessible for DH which can be either performed at home or may be professionally applied. The usual “at home” desensitizing agents include toothpastes, mouthwashes, or chewing gums which act by either hindering the neural transmission or sealing the dentinal tubules. There are some recent treatment choices such as bioglass, Portland cement, lasers, and casein phosphopeptides [ 6]. Alternatively, homeopathic medications including Plantago major and propolis are also seen as effective modalities [ 7].
